NK040(thi)048:1: // zab mo gcod kyi brgyud bskang nyams chag sbyang ba bzhugs so //
NK040(thi)048:3: skye med rnam dag mtha' dbus bral ba la //
NK040(thi)048:4: 'gags med thog bcas thog med snyem byed bdud //
NK040(thi)048:5: gang shar yul med rang rig dbyings su gcod //
NK040(thi)048:6: grub thob gcod brgyud bla ma'i thugs dam bskang //
NK040(thi)048:7: rang rig ngo bo smra bsam yul las 'das //
NK040(thi)048:8: yum chen pha rol phyin ma'i thugs dam don gnyis phun tshogs mdzad pa mthar phyin pa //
NK040(thi)048:9: bcom ldan sh+aakya'i rgyal po'i thugs ma rigs mun pa blo gros snang ba rgyas //
NK040(thi)048:10: 'phags pa 'jam dbyangs lha tshogs 'gro rnams 'jig pa brgyad la skyob mdzad ma //
NK040(thi)048:11: rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma'i thugs dam bskang //
NK040(thi)048:12: ma brgyud dpa' mo kun gyis yang rje mo //
NK040(thi)048:13: mkha' 'gro su ka si ti'i sgra tshad don gnyis 'dzam gling rgyan du shar //
NK040(thi)048:14: rje btsun ar+ya de ba'i thugs rgya bod kun la gdul bya smin grol mdzad //
NK040(thi)048:15: grub thob karma sh+ai la'i theg chen rgyud 'dzin man ngag bcud dang ldan //
NK040(thi)048:16: skyo ston bsod nams bla ma'i bka'i don rtogs 'gro ba'i dpal du shar //
NK040(thi)048:17: ma cig lab kyi sgron ma'i thugs sgo gsum gus pas ma cig mnyes pa sgrub //
NK040(thi)048:18: khu bsgom chos kyi seng+ge'i thugs bka' bzhin don gyi gcod kyi rgyud 'dzin ma //
NK040(thi)048:19: skyes ston dol pa zang thal skye med don rtogs chos brgyad rang sar grol //
NK040(thi)048:20: rje btsun rgya nag gcer bu'i chos rnams thugs bcud bsgrub mdzad mthar phyin pa //
NK040(thi)048:21: mkhas grub sangs rgyas rab ston sdom gsum bslab gsum don ldan mkhyen pa rgyas //
NK040(thi)048:22: rtogs ldan zal mo dge slong snyems rtog chod nas lus kyi gdon rnams thul //
NK040(thi)048:23: bla ma zhen med ras pa'i dgongs pa'i rten thob chos kyi spyan dang ldan //
NK040(thi)048:24: gu ru sangs rgyas rab ston skye med don la 'gags med blo 'byor pa //
NK040(thi)048:25: ras pa d+harma seng+ha'i gar bzhugs chos 'khor kun tu bskor mdzad pa //
NK040(thi)048:26: stob pa badz+ra seng+ha'i gnyen sa rgya che chos nyid don dang ldan //
NK040(thi)048:27: slob dpon pra dz+ny+aa gu ru'i thugs 'gro ba'i mgon gyur thig chen chos sgra sgrog /
NK040(thi)048:28: chos rje badz+ra sh+r+ai gnyis 'dzin rang grol snang srid chos skur shar //
NK040(thi)048:29: rtog ldan nam mkha' rdo rje'i thugs thos bsam rgya che bskyed rdzogs zung du 'jug /
NK040(thi)048:30: mkhas chen shi la ke tu'i dbu rdzogs phyag gsum don gyi bka' bab pa //
NK040(thi)048:31: mtshungs med chos kyi rdo rje'i phyi nang gsang ba'i chos rnams khong du chud //
NK040(thi)048:32: mkhas btsun dz+ny+aa na ke tu'i dam chos bdud kyi gcod yul bka' bab pa //
NK040(thi)048:33: dpal ldan a nan lak+shi'i thig le don ldan tshogs gnyis zung du 'jug /
NK040(thi)048:34: mkhas rtog pun+ye lak+shi'i rlung sems dbang thob 'gro don dam la btags //
NK040(thi)048:35: bshes gnyen badz+ra rasmi'i nam mkha' rdo rje ga ga ma ti dang //
NK040(thi)048:36: ka la badz+ra rnams kyi dbang drag rgya mtsho chos skyong rgya mtsho dang //
NK040(thi)048:37: klong gsal snying po rnams kyi chos nyid rgya mtsho bkra shis phun tshogs dang //
NK040(thi)048:38: nam mkha' rgya mtsho rnams kyi dri med zhing skyong skyabs mgon pan+di ta //
NK040(thi)048:39: nges don dbang po rnams kyi 'gyur med bstan 'dzin chos kyi blo gros dang //
NK040(thi)048:41: chos kyi rgya mtsho rdo rje legs bshad sogs //
NK040(thi)048:42: gcod chos thob tshad bla ma'i thugs dam bskang //
NK040(thi)048:43: bka' rgyud bla ma'i lung rig bcud 'dus pas //
NK040(thi)048:44: drin chen rtsa ba'i bla ma'i thugs dam bskang //
NK040(thi)048:45: gnyis 'dzin bdud rnams rang sar gcod mdzad pa //
NK040(thi)048:46: mched grogs chos mdzad yongs kyi thugs dam bskang //
NK040(thi)048:47: gsang sngags phyi nang gnyis kyi bsdus pa yi //
NK040(thi)048:48: yi dam zhi khro'i lha tshogs thugs dam bskang //
NK040(thi)048:50: dbus phyogs lhun gyis grub pa'i dur khrod nas //
NK040(thi)048:51: chos 'byung pad nyi ro'i gdan stengs su //
NK040(thi)048:52: sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro nyid dang dbyer med pa //
NK040(thi)048:53: sku lnga yongs rdzogs rdo rje rnal 'byor ma //
NK040(thi)048:54: sku mdog dmar nag zhal cig phyag gnyis pa //
NK040(thi)048:55: g.yas pas gri gug g.yon pas thod khrag bsnams //
NK040(thi)048:56: dbu skra thor tshug lhag ma mthur du grol //
NK040(thi)048:57: spyi gtsug phag zhal mthing nag ngur sgra sgrog /
NK040(thi)048:58: dar 'phen rus rgyan me long dril bu dang //
NK040(thi)048:59: rin chen rgyan spras kha t+w+aam mtshan du btsug /
NK040(thi)048:60: zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum ro'i gdan la 'gying //
NK040(thi)048:61: las bzhi lhun grub rigs bzhi mkha' 'gros bskor //
NK040(thi)048:62: rgyal ba kun gyi gsang ba yum mchog ma //
NK040(thi)048:63: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i thugs dam bskang //
NK040(thi)048:64: yum chen rdo rje phag mo'i thugs dam bskang //
NK040(thi)048:65: sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma yi thugs dam bskang //
NK040(thi)048:67: shar phyogs gtum drag 'bar ba'i dur khrod nas //
NK040(thi)048:68: zhi ba'i las mdzad rdo rje rnal 'byor ma //
NK040(thi)048:69: rdo rje rigs kyi mkha' 'gro 'bum gyis bskor //
NK040(thi)048:70: sku mdog dkar mo rdo rje thod khrag bsnams //
NK040(thi)048:71: rdo rje mkha' 'gro 'khor bcas thugs dam bskang //
NK040(thi)048:72: lho phyogs gtum drag 'bar ba'i dur khrod nas //
NK040(thi)048:73: rgyas pa'i las mdzad rin chen mkha' 'gro ma //
NK040(thi)048:74: rin chen rigs kyi mkha' 'gro 'bum gyis bskor //
NK040(thi)048:75: sku mdog ser mo rin chen thod khrag bsnams //
NK040(thi)048:77: nub phyogs pad+ma 'khyil ba'i dur khrod nas //
NK040(thi)048:78: dbang gi las mdzad pad+ma mkha' 'gro ma //
NK040(thi)048:79: pad+ma rigs kyi mkha' 'gro 'bum gyi bskor //
NK040(thi)048:80: sku mdog dmar mo pad+ma thod khrag bsnams //
NK040(thi)048:82: byang phyogs ki la ya yi'i dur khrod nas //
NK040(thi)048:83: drag po'i las mdzad karma mkha' 'gro ma //
NK040(thi)048:85: sku mdog ljang mo rgya gram thod khrag bsnams //
NK040(thi)048:86: las kyi mkha' 'gro 'khor bcas thugs dam bskang //
NK040(thi)048:87: kun kyang dbu skra thor tshug lhag ma grol //
NK040(thi)048:88: dar 'phen rus rgyan me long dril bu dang //
NK040(thi)048:89: rin chen rgyan spras kha t+w+aam mchan du bcug /
NK040(thi)048:90: zhabs gnyis brkyang skum ro'i gdan la 'gying //
NK040(thi)048:91: rigs lnga mkha' 'gro 'khor bcas shugs 'gro lnga'i tshogs
NK040(thi)048:92: kyi mkha' 'gro seng gdong ma'i gzhan yang 'jig rten
NK040(thi)048:95: ma sring rgya mtsho'i tshogs kyi mkha' 'gro sum cu
NK040(thi)048:96: rtsa gnyis 'bar ma chen mo brgyad kyi ma bdun
NK040(thi)048:97: sring mo bzhi'i dbang phyug nyi shu brgyad kyi 'bum
NK040(thi)048:98: phrag yangs pa'i mkha' 'gro'i ma yum bstan ma bcu
NK040(thi)048:99: gnyis sprul pa yang sprul rnams kyi thugs dam gnyan
NK040(thi)048:100: po bskang ba'i dam rdzas ni //
NK040(thi)048:101: phyi mchod 'don yon lnga dang nyer spyod lnga //
NK040(thi)048:102: nang mchod sman dang rak+ta ba ling+ta //
NK040(thi)048:103: 'dod yon tshogs kyi mchod pas thugs dam bskang //
NK040(thi)048:104: bdag gis nyams chag sdig sgrib ci mchis bshags //
NK040(thi)048:105: tshe dang bsod nams bsgrub pa mthar phyin sogs //
NK040(thi)048:106: byang chub sgrub pa'i mthun rkyen dngos grub stsol //
NK040(thi)048:107: nad gdon dgra bgegs dus min 'chi ba sogs //
NK040(thi)048:108: byang chub bsgrub pa'i 'gal rkyen bzlog tu gsol //
NK040(thi)048:109: grub thob gcod kyi rgyud pa'i bskang ba nyams chag
NK040(thi)048:110: dag byed tshogs gnyis chu rgyun zhes bya ba 'di
